Summary Note:
Daniela Eleonora Conti and the RM met at a networking event in Rome. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Daniela Eleonora Conti is a 48 year old Angel Investor from Italy.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Daniela Eleonora Conti and Marini have been married since 2005. They are proud parents of 3 children: Moretti, Benedetta and  Marino.
Education Background:
Daniela completed her secondary education at Istituto Tecnico Industriale Statale Enrico Mattei Roma in 1996.
Daniela earned her degree from Ca' Foscari University of Venice in 2000.
Occupation History:
Daniela Eleonora Conti is a seasoned professional with over 24 years of experience.
Daniela Eleonora Conti began her professional journey as a Stockbroker at UniCredit S.p.A. in 2001, laying the foundation for future success.
At UniCredit S.p.A., she held the position of Portfolio Manager from 2005 to 2006, making significant contributions to the organization.
She spent 3 years working as a Hedge Fund Manager at UniCredit S.p.A., refining her expertise and building a strong network.
After 9 years of dedication, she assumed the role of Private Equity Investor at Intesa Sanpaolo S.p.A. in 2010, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
Her current role as a Angel Investor at UniCredit S.p.A., which she has held since 2012, reflects her enduring passion for the field and her unwavering dedication to making a lasting impact.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 640000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has townhouse located in Ancona, worth 1210000 EUR.

She inherited a significant sum of 1730000 EUR from her mother, a respected Oil and Gas Executive, in 2013, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in her ability to achieve financial success and security.
